root: ^Well, that was exciting! Anyways, a pleasure. I'm-
^WAIT!!! WHAT?? You just came crashing through my window!
^Oh. Well, it wouldn't open from the outside.
^I think this was the next logical action actually!
^AS I was saying, I'm a recruiter with a nose for talent!
^On my daily bagel run- (there's a pretty good place near here)
^-my nose smelled a great deal of potential!
^The recruiter begins dusting off broken glass shards from-
^-the freshly baked bagel stashed in their pocket.
^Erm, my name is Justin and I use he/him pronouns.
^She grabs a glass-free bite out of her bagel and mumbles aloud.
^You can call me Recruiter and I use she/her pronouns.
^Hm, and I actually happen to be looking for work right now.
^I see some interesting objects laid out around here.
^I'll walk around using the mouse and left click.
^Anything I'm curious about will light up and I can left click-
^on it to prompt you to talk about them.
^If I want to ask about yourself I'll left click on you.
^Then, we can have a good ol' fashioned dialogue about it.
^Oddly specific but sounds professional. Let's do it!
